title: React & Redux Masterclass
description: Join our comprehensive masterclass on React and Redux to enhance your frontend development skills. Learn advanced techniques and best practices in building scalable applications.
additionalInfo: Dress code: Casual. No prior experience required.

title: Node.js Backend Bootcamp
description: A hands-on bootcamp focusing on building robust backend systems using Node.js and Express. Ideal for beginners and intermediate developers looking to improve their backend skills.
additionalInfo: Dress code: Smart casual. Bring your laptop.

title: Full-Stack Developer Networking
description: Network with full-stack developers from various industries. Discuss the latest trends and share experiences in web development in a relaxed, collaborative environment.

title: GraphQL & API Design Workshop
description: Deep dive into GraphQL and modern API design. This workshop covers schema design, query optimization, and integration strategies to create efficient APIs.
additionalInfo: Dress code: Casual. Prior knowledge of REST APIs recommended.

title: Modern JavaScript Innovations Summit
description: Explore the latest innovations in JavaScript at this summit featuring keynote speeches, panel discussions, and interactive breakout sessions on emerging trends.
additionalInfo: Dress code: Business attire. Limited seating available.
